rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that leads to the living area, with a corridor connecting various rooms. Vastu principles suggest an east or north direction for entrances if possible.

A large open space suitable for social gatherings and family activities, ideally positioned in the southern or eastern part of the floor plan. Mediterranean aesthetics can be emphasized with exposed brick finishes and terracotta tiles.

Well-equipped kitchen integrated into the living space for a seamless design flow. Placement is in the southeast to adhere to Vastu guidelines which favor this direction for kitchens in residential designs.
spacious master bedroom with a west-facing balcony (compliant with plot orientation) offering ventilation and views. Additional storage integrated within the design to maximize space usage.
A comfortable guest bedroom, also featuring a balcony that provides an outdoor feel while ensuring privacy, placed on the west side of the house to maintain symmetry with the master bedroom.
Attached to the living area and guest bedroom. The bathroom design includes functional storage and a window for natural light while maintaining privacy.

openings.location: North side of the plot (preferred per Vastu) or adjusted to maximize daylight if north is not available
openings.description: Double door entry for a grand entrance, with adequate lighting.

openings.location: Directly adjacent to both master and guest bedrooms
openings.description: Separate openings ensuring easy access from the bedrooms to their respective balconies. These are designed to offer direct ventilation and natural light, aligning with Vastu principles of open space on the west side.

openings.opening_type: Window Openings in Living Room & Kitchen
openings.location: Various strategic positions ensuring daylight penetration and cross ventilation
openings.description: Large windows with Mediterranean style detailing to enhance aesthetics and natural lighting, contributing to energy efficiency.

final_response.notes: The design incorporates Mediterranean style elements such as arches, terracotta tiles, and exposed brick finishes while integrating Vastu principles for optimal placement of rooms. The west-facing plot is taken into account by positioning the bedrooms with balconies on the west side to maximize evening light and views. Additional considerations include space-efficient layouts and a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor spaces.
